results.title: Prediction of Wound Healing in Diabetic Foot Ulcers: an Observational Study in Tertiary Hospital in Indonesia.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: in acute @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Foot</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017719 @@@diabetic foot ulcers@@@, wound area and @GENE_TNFRSF11B @GENE_4982 @@@OPG@@@ levels had positive correlation with wound healing, whereas @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ medications had negative correlation with wound healing.

citations.NLM: Soewondo P, Suyono S, Sastrosuwignyo MK, Harahap AR, Sutrisna B, Makmun LH. Prediction of Wound Healing in Diabetic Foot Ulcers: an Observational Study in Tertiary Hospital in Indonesia. Acta Med Indones. 2017 Jan;49(1):41-51. PMID: 28450653
